tool_description: An API to search a variety of online newspapers for the latest news
name: global-news-api
title: global-news-api

api_list.name: Specific Newspaper articles
api_list.description: Get all the newspaper articles from the specified newspaper containing the search string
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://global-news-api.p.rapidapi.com/news/news24/election"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "global-news-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://global-news-api.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}/{searchstring}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "global-news-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: All Newspaper articles
api_list.description: Get all the newspaper articles from all the available newspapers containing the search string
api_list.code:

api_list.name: Newspapers
api_list.description: Gets all the available newspapers to search in
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://global-news-api.p.rapidapi.com/newspapers"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "global-news-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
